borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension with sedum green roof and structural glass; installation of a new rooflight at main roof level; replacement of existing sash windows with new full height windows including the installation of new railings at third floor level to the rear elevation; re-instatement of 1no window at second floor level to the front elevation; erection of new metal staircase from lower ground to upper ground floor level, conversion of existing vault room into a bathroom including lowering of the floor level by 300mm, conversion of the second vault room into a utility room at the front of the property; conversion of the storage room underneath the rear staircase into a wc room; Internal alterations to include: 3rd floor - formation of a shower room, removal of open shelves & wall brackets; 2nd floor - conversion of existing bathroom into a dressing room: new 2000mm wide opening formed in spine wall between bedroom and new dressing room, existing rear bedroom converted into a bathroom; 1st floor - re-configuration of existing shower room to create a separate wc and shower room; Ground floor - conversion of existing bedroom into a kitchen, existing hall false ceiling removed and new applied to underside of stair flight above, existing opening between hall and new kitchen infilled, new opening in spine wall between dining room and new kitchen: shelfing either side of chimney breasts in kitchen and dining room removed; Lower ground floor - existing kitchen removed, formation of new wall to create a bedroom with new door, frame and architraves, existing opening on spine wall bricked up and installation of new door, frame and architraves, existing ceiling in proposed kitchen/dining area, and new ceiling installed between existing joists; All floor levels - existing floor finishes lifted and replaced with new, installation of new replacement heating, lighting, small power, fire alarm and waste water plumbing; associated internal & external alterations.
